tag_list: ceo, founder, online-media, online-advertising, web-development, business-development
overview:
Grant Brown has a love for start ups, technology, web development and sports.

After for working for several internet start ups during his college career from marketing agencies to social networks, Grant co-founded Windy City Media Network, LLC in February 2010 just prior to his graduation from Southern Illinois Carbondale. At SIU-C, Grant studied Business and Administration with a concentration in Web Development.

Using his start up experience and love of sports and blogs, WCMN launched its first major product: Rant Sports (www.rantsports.com).

Grant has been a key driver in the success of Rant Sports as co-CEO, taking Rant Sports to over 1.4 million monthly unique visitors in just under two years.

degrees.subject: Business and Administration, Concentration in Web Development
